NPC.Name: Acolyte
NPC.Description: A person assisting the celebrant in a religious service or procession.

NPC.Name: Archmage
NPC.Description: A powerful (and usually quite old) spellcaster dedicated to the study of the arcane arts.

NPC.Name: Assassin
NPC.Description: A person that specializes in killing and ambushing other people.

NPC.Name: Balloon Grenadier
NPC.Description: A soldier that specializes in the throwing of grenades and sometimes assault operations.

NPC.Name: Bandit
NPC.Description: A robber or outlaw belonging to a gang and typically operating in an isolated or lawless area.

NPC.Name: Bandit Captain
NPC.Description: A bandit that leads a gang of bandits.

NPC.Name: Berserker
NPC.Description: A tall, massive swordsman who fights in a wild frenzy of emotions.

NPC.Name: Boar Pit Fighter
NPC.Description: An expert warrior who learned to fight in closed spaces, such as dungeons or gladiator pits, by picking up unorthodox survival methods that might be considered dishonorable.

NPC.Name: Bodyguard
NPC.Description: A person hired to escort and protect another person.

NPC.Name: Burrowshark
NPC.Description: A fearsome magical beast who had become a dangerous predator. It's origins are unknown.

NPC.Name: Commoner
NPC.Description: An ordinary person, without rank or title.

NPC.Name: Reaver
NPC.Description: An aggressive individual whose contact with other humans appears limited to combat, rape, torture, murder, and cannibalism, and who never communicates verbally with others; yet they are never shown in conflict with each other.

NPC.Name: Cult Fanatic
NPC.Description: A cult member, often part of a cultâ€™s leadership, who uses their Charisma and dogma to influence and prey on those of weak will.

NPC.Name: Cultist
NPC.Description: A member of an unorthodox cult who generally lives outside of conventional society under the direction of a charismatic leader.

NPC.Name: Dragonclaw
NPC.Description: A higher-ranking foot soldier in the Cult of the Dragon that either leads a group of lesser cultists or works in a group with other dragonclaws for really important missions.

NPC.Name: Dragonfang
NPC.Description: A higher-ranking cultist in the Cult of the Dragon that usually commands a group of Dragonclaws.

NPC.Name: Dragonsoul
NPC.Description: The highest-ranking cultist in the Cult of the Dragon that leads the entirety of their sect of the cult.

NPC.Name: Dragonwing
NPC.Description: A higher-ranking cultist in the Cult of the Dragon that usually oversees the dragonfangs.

NPC.Name: Druid
NPC.Description: A priest, magician, or soothsayer that wields nature-themed magic.

NPC.Name: Elemental Anchor
NPC.Description: An anchor that has now been animated by external forces.

NPC.Name: Evil Sorcerer
NPC.Description: A malevolent person who has magic powers.

NPC.Name: Fathomer
NPC.Description: A person who can shapeshift into a serpent.

NPC.Name: Flamewrath
NPC.Description: A magician that specializes in controlling and utilizing fire.

NPC.Name: Gladiator
NPC.Description: A person trained to fight with weapons against other gladiators or wild animals in an arena.

NPC.Name: Guard
NPC.Description: A soldier or other person formally assigned to protect a person or to control access to a place that keeps watch.

NPC.Name: Hurricane
NPC.Description: A monk in the Cult of the Howling Hatred.

NPC.Name: Knight
NPC.Description: A warrior who pledges service to rulers, religious orders, and noble causes.

NPC.Name: Mage
NPC.Description: A person who spends their life in the study and practice of magic.

NPC.Name: Miner
NPC.Description: A person who works in a mine.

NPC.Name: Noble
NPC.Description: A person of noble rank or birth who wields great authority and influence as a member of the upper class, possessing wealth and connections that can make them as powerful as monarchs and generals.

NPC.Name: One-Eyed Shiver
NPC.Description: A magician who specializes in controlling and utilizing water.

NPC.Name: Priest
NPC.Description: An ordained minister that brings the teachings of their gods to the common folk.

NPC.Name: Razerblast
NPC.Description: A foot soldier whose armor is hot and usually fiery.

NPC.Name: Cavalry Officer
NPC.Description: An officer that leads and commands a cavalry.

NPC.Name: Patrol
NPC.Description: A person sent to keep watch over an area.

NPC.Name: Monk
NPC.Description: A martial artist, specializing in unarmed combat.

NPC.Name: Scout
NPC.Description: A soldier or other person sent out ahead of a main force so as to gather information about the enemy's position, strength, or movements.

NPC.Name: Skyweaver
NPC.Description: A magician who specializes in controlling and utilizing air.

NPC.Name: Spy
NPC.Description: A person who secretly collects and reports information on the activities, movements, and plans of an enemy or competitor.

NPC.Name: Stonemelder
NPC.Description: An engineer that designs many things and is one of the primary magic item creators in the world.

NPC.Name: Thug
NPC.Description: A ruthless enforcer skilled at intimidation and violence.

NPC.Name: Tribal Warrior
NPC.Description: A warrior who lives beyond civilization and acts in accordance with the wishes of their chief.

NPC.Name: Veteran
NPC.Description: A professional fighter that takes up arms for pay or to protect something they believe in or value.
